sources.title: A Prize of Arms
sources.description: Title: A Prize of Arms Summary: A criminal gang sets out to pull off the heist of a large army payroll. Directed by: Cliff Owen Actors: Stanley Baker, Helmut Schmid, Tom Bell Production Company: George Maynard Productions Release Date: 12 October 1962 (West Germany) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A criminal gang sets out to pull off the heist of a large army payroll.

metadata.Plot: A criminal gang sets out to pull off the heist of a large army payroll.
metadata.Writer: Paul Ryder, Nicolas Roeg, Kevin Kavanagh
metadata.Actors: Stanley Baker, Helmut Schmid, Tom Bell
